title: Add username/password admin authentication and provide deployment guidance

requirements.text: Replace Internet Identity authentication with username/password authentication system for administrator login. Store admin credentials securely in the backend. Allow the administrator to set and change their username and password through the admin settings page.

quotes: Make an option that the Administrator of the website have a username with a password to connect with the website

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can log in with username and password instead of Internet Identity
Credentials are stored securely in the backend with password hashing
Admin settings page includes fields to update username and password
Login form validates credentials against backend
Invalid credentials display appropriate error messages
Session management maintains admin authentication state

requirements.text: Update all admin pages to work with the new username/password authentication system, ensuring the administrator can manage videos, photos, backgrounds, sponsors, partners, mentors (team members), and all other content after logging in with username and password.

quotes: whenever he wants to share videos, photos, add or remove background, edit or change pictures, for sponsors, parteners, mentors and more

acceptanceCriteria: All existing admin functionality remains accessible after username/password login
AdminGuard component validates username/password authentication
Admin can upload and manage gallery photos
Admin can add and remove videos
Admin can change hero background and logo images
Admin can manage sponsors and partners
Admin can edit team member (mentor) profiles
No functionality is lost during authentication system migration

requirements.text: Create a new admin documentation section explaining how to deploy the SMART HAITI website for free on the Internet Computer blockchain. Include step-by-step instructions for deploying the canister, configuring the custom domain, and verifying the deployment is live and accessible.

quotes: tell me how to launch the website without pay nothing

acceptanceCriteria: Documentation page includes free deployment instructions for Internet Computer
Step-by-step guide covers canister deployment process
Instructions explain how to obtain a free .icp domain or configure custom domain
Documentation confirms the deployment is already hosted on Internet Computer
Deployment costs and maintenance are explained as free/minimal

requirements.text: Add SEO optimization documentation to the admin documentation page explaining how to improve search visibility for 'Smart Haiti' searches. Include guidance on adding meta tags, descriptions, keywords, and best practices for making the website appear quickly in search results. Update the HTML head with optimized meta tags including title, description, and keywords targeting 'Smart Haiti', 'SMART HAITI', Haiti education, Haiti NGO, and related terms.

quotes: to be very visible that when somebody type Smart Haiti so that our website appear quickly

acceptanceCriteria: HTML head includes comprehensive meta tags with 'Smart Haiti' and related keywords
Meta description clearly describes SMART HAITI organization and mission
Open Graph tags are added for social media sharing
Admin documentation explains SEO best practices
Documentation covers how to improve search rankings organically
Title tag optimized for 'SMART HAITI' searches
Keywords include variations: 'Smart Haiti', 'SMART HAITI', 'Haiti education NGO'

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
Preserve all existing admin functionality during authentication migration
Ensure password storage follows security best practices with hashing
Keep deployment instructions specific to Internet Computer platform
nonGoals: Adding multi-user admin roles or permissions beyond single administrator
Automated SEO tools or paid search engine submission services
Email verification or password recovery features
